witnesses.xml:
Leaning her bony breast on the hard thorn she crooned out her forgiveness.
Was it then ...

.. as she stood the chair straight by the dressing table, leaning her bony breast on the hard thorn, her forgiveness of it all.

Was it then that she had her consolations, when, ...
... ... or the hum far away in the fields of some some hum rising far away in the in the fields; whethersome throb;some pulse. & then gentlymak muffling & folding the house again.…
... the drone and the hum of the fields, a dog's bark, a man's shout ...

<text>...<s>Frankenstein discovered that I detailed or made notes concerning his history he asked to see them & himself corrected <add place="superlinear">and augmented</add>them in many places ... </s>...</text>

<text>…<s>Frankenstein discovered <del rend="strikethrough">or</del><add place="superlinear">that I</add> made notes concerning his history; he asked to see them and then himself <del rend="strikethrough">a</del> corrected and augmented them in many places, ... </s></text>

<text>...<s>I wish<del rend="strikethrough">ed</del> to soothe him yet <del rend="strikethrough">could</del><add place="superlinear" hand="#pbs">can</add> <del rend="strikethrough">tell</del><add place="superlinear" hand="#pbs">counsel</add> <add place="superlinear">one</add> so infinitely miserable.</s></text>

<text>...<s>... I wish to soothe him yet can<del rend="strikethrough">not</del> <del rend="strikethrough">o</del> I counsel one so infinitely miserable, so destitute of every hope of consolation to live?</s> <s>Oh, no! ... </s>...</text>
